alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Oglala Lakota; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foothills; Southern Oglala Lakota; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 3:32PM MST until January 19 at 8:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
